text: The 2018 Listowel Mixed Doubles Cashspiel was a curling event held from March 31 to April 2 at the Listowel Curling Club in Listowel, Ontario as part of the World Curling Tour. The event was held in a round robin format. ==Teams== The teams are listed as follows: {| class=wikitable |- ! Female !! Male !! Locale |- | Carrie Burden || Alex Robertson || St.Mary's, Ontario |- | Katie Cottrill || Shaun Cottrill || Listowel, Ontario |- | Brianne Donegan || Sam Steep || Listowel, Ontario |- | Brenda Edger || Lorne Koch || Vanastra, Ontario |- | Farzana Husain || Rayad Husain || Georgetown, Guyana |- | Sherry Just || Ryan Deis || Fox Valley, Saskatchewan |- | Catherine Liscomb || Chris Liscomb || Ilderton, Ontario |- | Kaitlyn Little || Matt Trennum || Niagara, Ontario |- | Janet Murphy || Hugh Murphy || Mississauga, Ontario |- | Jessica Shipmkaker || Craig Shinde || Mississauga, Ontario |- | Laurie Nuhn || Dennis Nuhn || Listowel, Ontario |- | Elana Sone || Leonid Rivkind || Metulla, Israel |- | Kimberly Tuck || Wayne Tuck Jr. || Ilderton, Ontario |- | Nicole Westlund Stewart || Tyler Stewart || Kitchener-Waterloo, Ontario |- | Lauren Wasylkiw || Shane Konings || Unionville, Ontario |- | Crimson White || George White || St.Mary's, Ontario |} ==Round robin standings== Final round robin standings {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=2|Key |- | style="background:#ffffcc; width:20px;"| |align=left|Teams to Playoffs |- | style="background:#ccffcc; width:20px;"| |align=left|Teams to Tiebreakers |} {| |- | style="width:10%; vertical-align:top;"| {| class="wikitable" |- ! width=165|Pool A !! width=15| W !! width=15| L |- style="background:#ffffcc; | K.
